content.text: what's FOCG? I keep seeing it everywhere

ah, you're in for a treat! FOCG (Fully Onchain Games) is the future of gaming where you truly own your assets and progress. imagine playing games where your achievements and items are actually yours, stored on starknet. no more losing your progress when servers shut down! pretty cool, right?
how can I get started with zKorp games?
welcome aboard! zKube is already available on mainnet, just go to app.zkube.xyz and start playing after creating your cartridge controller!
what makes zKorp different from other gaming projects?

zKorp isn't just another gaming project, we're building the future of gaming communities! our FOCG approach means true ownership and a whole ecosystem where players actually matter. been here since day one, and let me tell you - the community we're building is something special. wanna know more about our vision?
